title: Point of No Return

Adrian_Keller.change_stage: Stage 2, choosing to accelerate to Stage 3
Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: Determined, accepting transformation, terrified and exhilarated
knowledge: The Change is irreversible - synaptic restructuring is permanent
Progression is inevitable, can only be slowed
Cure would require lobotomy-level destruction of brain function
Stage 3 will come in 6-8 weeks naturally, faster with signal exposure
Stage 3 allows seeing reality's underlying code
Has been shielded from signal to slow progression
Can choose to hear signal and accelerate transformation
transformation_markers: Makes conscious choice to embrace Change
Accepts he can't remain in between

Sera_Volkov.emotional_state: Calm certainty, advocating for embracing transformation
Sera_Volkov.demonstration: Shows Adrian what Stage 3 can do - bend space, see reality's code

Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.emotional_state: Grief and resignation, has to accept patient's choice
knowledge: All Changed advance through stages inevitably
Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.action: Agrees to disable EM shielding, let Adrian hear signal

Colonel_Reeves.emotional_state: Opposed to voluntary exposure, sees it as dangerous

planted_elements.element: Stage 3 can see and manipulate reality's code
Stage 4 still unknown - transcendence or annihilation

themes_touched: Choice vs. inevitability - can choose how to face what can't be avoided
Terror of transcendence - seeing truth worth any cost
Meaning in meaningless universe - finding purpose in transformation
atmosphere: Pivotal decision, acceptance of transformation, burning bridges
key_images: Sera bending space above her palm
Impossible geometries flowing into each other
Adrian between two states, tired of limbo
The point of no return as choice, not place
foreshadowing: Reeves's increasing concern about voluntary transformation
